Message.Title: Ebay Works & Works Well

Message.Title: Where did all the REGULARS go?
Message.Msg: Thanks Yahoo, you chased off all your own posters. . .

Topic.Title: Where did all the REGULARS go?

Message.Title: Sorry ebay sellers, I won't be paying you anytime soon!
Message.Msg: I just bought over $3000 of items on ebay and ebay put a hold on paypal account because a buyer says the item condition isn't what it said in the auction even though there was no description in the acution and the photo clearly shows the item and the buyer now looks at it and says "oh I guess I can see the condition now." To bring my account up to zero I have to pay paypal before making payments to sellers. That's not going to happen. Sorry sellers! You will have to wait up to a week for the buyer to return the item, then I have to decide if the buyer was correct in his statements, then I have to wait 3-4 days for ebay to respond and make a decision, and if the decision is against me I cancel my paypal and ebay accounts then I go buy and sell on a more friendly site, meanwhile you will have to relist the items! Great business ebay! Way to go! I have to go now and cancel all my auctions.

Message.Title: How does ebay stay in business with poor customer service?
Message.Msg: Try finding their email address? They have none! An online company with no email address? This says it all, avoid ebay!

Topic.Title: Sorry ebay sellers, I won't be paying you anytime soon!

Message.Msg: I have to now tell all the sellers they have to wait ten days for the payment, or never. There's nothing they can do.

Topic.Title: Ebay Works & Works Well

Message.Msg: LOL, try telling it to all the sellers I'm not paying until paypal unholds my account! Yes eventually I may cancel my ebay and paypal accounts, it doesn't matter I have shopped on other auction sites and a lot on Amazon, even though I spent $3000 this week on ebay but ebay doesn't work well when it scares big spenders away like me.

Topic.Title: Ebay and Paypal fees are now 9% and 3%

Message.Msg: They are anti-seller anyway. I used to sell a lot on ebay until they became anti-seller, I usually just throw good things away rather than sell it on ebay, the buyers have taken advantage of this anti-seller mentality and make false complaints and lie in the feedback and the seller can't do anything about it.

Message.Title: Ebay works horribly, has for years
Message.Msg: This anti seller sentiment has to end. If you haven't been around for long on ebay, they used to be a great company but they needed to grow and grow fast. They decided that they would target mega large sellers and the small sellers weren't necessary anymore, so they came up with these anti seller rules and made it more costly for small sellers. If you look on ebay it's mostly all small sellers, if these small sellers stopped selling on ebay it would be a ghost town there and buyers would go somewhere else. Ebay's growth strategy didn't work and Meg Whitman took to the road. Ebay will not change back to the old ways, it's a corporation in need of the masses, it can not grow fast enough with small sellers so you mean nothing to them.Despite this ebay has been scaring buyers and sellers away for years which is a poor business strategy. That's why this company remains a STRONG SELL.

Message.Title: This board used to be hopping, now dead
Message.Msg: Ebay is becomiing a ghost town.

Topic.Title: Ebay and Paypal fees are now 9% and 3%

Message.Msg: By the money their making Qtr after Qtr it's hard to say that people are walking away from eBay, the numbers show that they are still growing significantly despite not raising rates for a few years now. Amazon charges more, yet eBay makes a lot more money....

Topic.Title: Sorry ebay sellers, I won't be paying you anytime soon!

Message.Msg: So far the sellers are cool about it. I called ebay and they essentially said they would hate to see me go but good riddence. I've cancled all my "Watch" items that I had planned to bid on, canceled my bids, and closed all my sale auctions, and the buyer won't get a refund after all this as there is no money in the account, and ebay loses fees, and the sellers have to wait for their payment. Why are there policies to begin with if ebay doesn't follow them?
